snippet: The findings of the poll, conducted by Quinnipiac University, lend credibility to the governor's contention that New Yorkers care more about getting results in Albany than the sometimes unseemly process leading to those results.
abstract: The findings of the poll, conducted by Quinnipiac University, lend credibility to the governor's contention that New Yorkers care more about getting results in Albany than the sometimes unseemly process leading to those results.

headline.main: Voters Like Cuomo's Work but Not His Methods, Poll Finds
